body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations              Multimedia Presentations          Cannoneers To Your Posts! A photo tour of an artillery detachment in action. (Flash movie) size: 2.53 MB           Torpedoes at Drewry's Bluff. (Flash video) length: approximately 3 minutes         The story of the 11th Alabama and the flag carried at the battles of Gaines' Mill and Glendale is told in this video podcast. "Southern Cross" by Don Troiani, courtesy of Historical Art Prints.  Used with permission.
title: Richmond National Battlefield Park: Multimedia Presentations
